member.name: M:Xamarin.Controls.PathSmoothing.SmoothedPathWithGranularity(Windows.UI.Input.Inking.InkStroke,System.Int32)
member.summary: Obtain a smoothed path with the specified granularity from the current path using Catmull-Rom spline. Also outputs a List of the points corresponding to the smoothed path.
member.remarks: Implemented using a modified version of the code in the solution at http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8702696/drawing-smooth-curves-methods-needed
